attributes.action: make sure we don't have to pay taxes to pay for those who don't want to work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we pay for people who don't want to work e,g Immigrants, Benefits cheats, & some politicians who claim to be doing whats right for the people & forget about them after they are voted in.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
